revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (3), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (3)

|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GEME-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25U1635FZNI-10G; |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9CCNNNBKTAL-NUD; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *{{WPLink|Amazon_Echo}} {{see also|Amazon Echo Devices}} {{FCC ST|03/19/2019|indexme.}} :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2ANZL-2474 2ANZL-2474] - Digital Media Receiver (''Microstrip L.L.C.'')
*[[Amazon Echo Show (DW84JL)]] (2 Gen) • [https://www.amazon.com/All-new-Echo-Show-2nd-Gen/dp/B077SXWSRP B077SXWSRP] (November 6, 2018) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2ANZL-2474 2ANZL-2474] (09/20/2018) • 802.11abgn/ac (2x2), BT 4.1/ZigBee :CPU: [[Intel Atom]] x5-Z8350 (@1.92GHz), Bluetooth (A2DP)/ZigBee (802.15.4) :Display: 10.1” IPS Touchscreen, Camera: 5MP, Audio: Dual 2" stereo speaker <!-- :[[Intel Atom]] x5-Z8350 (SR2KT) - Quad Core (2M Cache, up to 1.92GHz) :Cherry Trail, @1.44GHz, GPU, DDR3L-RS 1600, (SDP 2W, 14nm) :S''K SK hynix'' H9CCNNNBKTAL - 2GB RAM :[[Samsung]] KLM8G1GEME - 8GB NAND eMMC Flash :''Macronix'' MX25U1635F - 2MB (16Mb) 1.8V serial flash memory :[[Cypress]] CYW43570KFFBG - 5G Wi-Fi 802.11ac 2×2 BT 4.1 EDR :[[Texas Instruments]] TPA3118 - 30W Stereo (BTL) Class-D Audio Amplifier :[[TI]] TLV320DAC3203 - Ultra-Low Power Codec for portable Audio applications :4x [[TI]] TLV320ADC3101 - 92dB SNR Low-Power Stereo ADC (Echo/Echo Dot) √ :[[TI]] SND9039A2 - Power Manager IC, 8x Microphone, PSU Adapter: 15V DC 1.4A :''Focaltech System'' FT5726NE - 10-point Capacitive Touch Controller :[[Silicon Labs]] EFR32 MG12P232F 1024GM48-B - ZigBee Controller (MCU ARM Cortex-M4) :EFR32MG12P - Mighty Gecko Mesh Networking Wireless SoC for ZigBee and Thread -->
==Links of Interest== *[https://technology.ihs.com/607687/teardown-amazon-echo-show-dw84jl-2nd-gen ''Teardown - Amazon Echo Show (DW84JL)'' on '''IHS Markit'''] ([https://technology.ihs.com/Teardowns/binary/devices/3432/photos/143333/binary Block diagram])
==See also== *[[Amazon Echo Show (MW46WB)]] (1 Gen) • [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01J24C0TI B01J24C0TI] • [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Amazon+Echo+Show+Teardown/94625 ''Teardown'' on '''iFixit'''] :CPU: [[Intel Atom]] x5-Z8350 (@1.92GHz), 802.11abgn/ac, Bluetooth 4.1 EDR :Display: 7" Touchscreen, Camera: 5MP, Audio: Dual 2" stereo speaker <!-- :[[Intel Atom]] x5-Z8350 (SR2KT) - Processor (2M Cache, up to 1.92GHz) :SK hynix H9CCNNNBKTML - 2GB RAM :Sandisk SDIN9DS2-8G - 8GB NAND (Embedded Flash Drive) :Winbond W25Q16FW - 2MB (16Mb) 1.8V Serial Flash Memory :Broadcom/Cypress BCM43570KFFBG - 5G Wi-Fi 802.11ac 2×2 BT 4.1 EDR :Texas Instruments TPA3118 - 30W Stereo (BTL) Class-D Audio Amplifier :4x Texas Instruments TLV320ADC3101 - 92dB SNR Low-Power Stereo ADC (Echo/Echo Dot) :Wolfson WM8904G - Ultra-Low Power Codec for portable Audio applications :TI SND9039A2 - Power Manager IC, 8x Microphone, PSU Adapter 15VDC 1.4A :Goodix GT9271 - 10-point Capacitive Touch Controller -->
*[[Amazon Echo Show (DW84JL)]] (2 Gen) • [https://www.amazon.com/All-new-Echo-Show-2nd-Gen/dp/B077SXWSRP B077SXWSRP] (November 6, 2018) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2ANZL-2474 2ANZL-2474] (09/20/2018) • 802.11abgn/ac (2x2), BT 4.1/ZigBee :CPU: [[Intel Atom]] x5-Z8350 (@1.92GHz), Bluetooth (A2DP)/ZigBee (802.15.4) :Display: 10.1” IPS Touchscreen, Camera: 5MP, Audio: Dual 2" stereo speaker
